N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.24 - Program development grants

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner may provide program development grants to a voluntary
not-for-profit organization developing a residential treatment
facility. (b) The agreement entered
into by a provider of services to obtain a program development grant will
require the provider of services to repay the program development grant to the
extent that reimbursement is obtained for the costs incurred through use of the
program development grant funds. (c) In addition to the basic rate of payment
set pursuant to sections
578.7, 578.8 and
578.9
of this Part, there shall be
a second rate of payment set for a residential treatment facility which has
received a program development grant. This second rate of payment will include
costs incurred through use of the grant funds. (d) Costs incurred through use of program
development grants will be amortized over a five-year period. (e) Office of Mental Health and Department of

Social Services will establish procedures through rate payment mechanisms for
repayment of the program development grant. (f) When the provider of service ceases
operations as a residential treatment facility, any unpaid program development
grants may be recouped directly from the provider of service. Notes
